description: You are given two strings of the same length s1 and s2 and a string baseStr. We say s1[i] and s2[i] are equivalent characters. Equivalent characters follow the usual rules of any equivalence relation: For example, given the equivalency information from s1 = "abc" and s2 = "cde", "acd" and "aab" are equivalent strings of baseStr = "eed", and "aab" is the lexicographically smallest equivalent string of baseStr. Return the lexicographically smallest equivalent string of baseStr by using the equivalency information from s1 and s2.
